message:
Replace Disco Elysium voices with Echo system (6 Chinese personas)

- Replace 13 Disco Elysium voices with 6 Echo Chinese voice personas
- Add file-based prompt loading system (backend/prompts/*.md)
- Extract and condense prompts from echo.md to ~35-45 lines each
- Update config.py to load prompts from files dynamically
